policy.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="API :- Layer7 Operator UseCase - GW Info"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="************************************************************"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="API Group :- REST Encryption"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="API TYPE :- REST"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Author: Balaji Radhakrishnan"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="************************************************************"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MjAw"/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="RespCode"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="eyAiRXhjZXB0aW9uIjogIkF1dGhlbnRpY2F0aW9uIEZhaWxlZCIsDQogICJEZXNjcmlwdGlvbiI6ICJVc2VyIG5vdCBmb3VuZCwgcGxlYXNlIGNoZWNrIHJlLXRyeS4iIH0="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="Error"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtyZXF1ZXN0Lmh0dHAuaGVhZGVyLm9yaWdpbn0="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="origin"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtyZXF1ZXN0Lmh0dHAubWV0aG9kfQ=="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="method"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
        </wsp:All>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:SslAssertion/>
                <L7p:Encapsulated>
                    <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="d049dd6f-250f-477a-bfa3-262887f5ead0"/>
                    <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="FetchResponseHeaders"/>
                    <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="allowCredentials"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="true"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="allowHeaders"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="Authorization, Content-Type"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="allowMethods"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="GET, OPTIONS"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="allowOrigin"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="${origin}"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Parameters>
                </L7p:Encapsulated>
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${method}"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item dataType="included">
                                    <L7p:Type variableDataType="string"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                                <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="OPTIONS"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:HardcodedResponse>
                            <L7p:Base64ResponseBody stringValue=""/>
                            <L7p:ResponseContentType stringValue="application/json; charset=UTF-8"/>
                        </L7p:HardcodedResponse>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:HttpBasic/>
                        <L7p:Authentication>
                            <L7p:IdentityProviderOid goidValue="0000000000000000fffffffffffffffe"/>
                        </L7p:Authentication>
                        <L7p:HardcodedResponse>
                            <L7p:Base64ResponseBody stringValue=""/>
                            <L7p:ResponseContentType stringValue="application/json; charset=UTF-8"/>
                        </L7p:HardcodedResponse>
                    </wsp:All>
                </wsp:OneOrMore>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="NDAx"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="RespCode"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="eyAiRXhjZXB0aW9uIjogIkF1dGhlbnRpY2F0aW9uIEZhaWxlZCIsDQogICJEZXNjcmlwdGlvbiI6ICJVc2VyIG5vdCBmb3VuZCwgcGxlYXNlIGNoZWNrIHJlLXRyeS4iIH0="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="Error"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:CustomizeErrorResponse>
                    <L7p:Content stringValue="${Error}"/>
                    <L7p:ContentType stringValue="application/json; charset=UTF-8"/>
                    <L7p:ExtraHeaders nameValuePairArray="included">
                        <L7p:item nameValuePair="included">
                            <L7p:Key stringValue="l7-resp-code"/>
                            <L7p:Value stringValue="${RespCode}"/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:ExtraHeaders>
                    <L7p:HttpStatus stringValue="${RespCode}"/>
                    <L7p:IncludePolicyDownloadURL booleanValue="true"/>
                </L7p:CustomizeErrorResponse>
                <L7p:RaiseError/>
            </wsp:All>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>
